context.title: Office Items
body: In an office, there are many important items. You can find a desk, a chair, and a computer. The desk is for working. The chair is for sitting.
On the desk, there are also some office supplies. You can see pens, pencils, and paper. Pens are for writing. Pencils are for drawing.
There is a printer in the office. The printer prints documents. People use it to make copies of papers.
A stapler is another useful item. It helps to keep papers together. You can find it next to the paper.
In the office, there is also a calendar. The calendar shows the days and months. It helps people remember important dates.

scenario.setting: An office with desks and supplies
scenario.summary: You need to discuss the office supplies you need for your work.

roles.name: Student 1
roles.details: You need paper and pens. You want to know where to find them.

roles.name: Student 2
roles.details: You know where the supplies are. You can suggest alternatives.

steps: Student 1 asks Student 2 about paper and pens.
Student 2 answers and suggests where to find them.
Student 1 asks if there are other options for pens.
Student 2 suggests different types of pens.
Student 1 thanks Student 2 for the help.
